name: The Deep: Sea of Shadows
description:
A mysterious dark ink is clouding the ocean’s depths and corrupting the creatures who live there, and the Nektons need your help to unravel the mystery! In the first action adventure game based on animated television series The Deep, play as Ant and Fontaine as you pilot the Aronnax, then diver deeper in a Knight suit. As you explore, you’ll encounter sunken ruins and uncover lost secrets of Lemuria! Unlock powerful new abilities for the Knights, and use them to defeat the dark forces at work!

Swipe to navigate, and use your scanner to research marine life and possible Lemurian artifacts. Use your Knights’ abilities to cure corrupted sealife, and restore light and peace to the ocean’s depths.

Features:
• Play as Ant and Fontaine Nekton
• Pilot the Aronnax, White Knight and Shadow Knight to reach the depths of the ocean!
• 8 powerful Knight abilities to unlock!
• Discover Lemurian artifacts and ruins, and unlock secrets of the lost civilization
